name: Towers Of Hanoi (Eric's Gear)
description:
This is an expansion of the ancient idea of the Tower of Hanoi. Instead of 3 disks and 3 pegs, there are anywhere from 3 to 10 disks and 3 to 6 pegs.

Wait, you're not familiar with this game? Well, you have to move a stack of disks from one peg to another, one at a time and without putting a larger disk on top of a smaller disk.

Sounds easy? Well, sure! Try you hand at 32 different levels and see if you change your mind.
